job_history.work_description: Assist in the oversight of Plant Operation services; provide information and serve as a resource to department Administrator(s) and staff; achieve defined objectives by assisting in planning, evaluating, developing, implementing and maintaining services in compliance with established guidelines, codes, and regulations; and supervising and directing assigned staff.
Assisted children with their homework; planned and supervised activities; provided instruction, maintain order and safety among children.

Supervised and tended to all dance students relating to injuries, concerns, questions, and moral support; taught dance classes; videographer for events and auditions; typed, filed, organized all documents.

Taught and Instructed children from ages 3-16 and adults ages 18-65 in areas of Modern, Jazz, Hip-Hop, Ballet, Tap, Tribal Fusion, Stretch, and Cardio; producer for all performances, supervised students, book keeping, billing, maintenance.
Billing, accounts payable/receivable; scheduling; documentation; meet with parents and students regarding any concerns, questions, explanations with their lessons or instructors.

Taught video production courses in Dance Dept, supervised video assistant and crew, maintain, re-order, care, instruction, organization of all video/media equipment, set-up of all equipment and live edit within the theater for performances, updating and restoring the archive vault, documenting all performances, oversight of all video/media work within the dept.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in supervising and directing staff in various roles, including Assistant Director and Owner/Artistic Director, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Teaching
skills.explanation: Has taught a wide range of subjects, including dance, video production, and arts, to students of various ages, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Video Production
skills.explanation: Has experience in teaching video production courses, supervising video assistants, and maintaining video equipment, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Dance Instruction
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in teaching dance classes to students of various ages, including Modern, Jazz, Hip-Hop, Ballet, Tap, Tribal Fusion, Stretch, and Cardio, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Administration
skills.explanation: Has experience in office management, including billing, accounts payable/receivable, scheduling, and documentation, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Has experience in managing projects, including producing performances and maintaining video equipment, but the scope of these projects is not extensive, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Has experience in communicating with parents, students, and staff, but the extent of this experience is not clear, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Organization
skills.explanation: Has experience in organizing documents, maintaining equipment, and scheduling, but the extent of this experience is not clear, indicating a solid working proficiency.
